TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class GridViewRow Inherits TableRow Implements IDataItemContainer
public ref class GridViewRow : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableRow, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的個別資料列。

span.span: Represents an individual row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別代表個別的資料列中控制項。The class is used represent an individual row in a control. 每個資料列控制項具有指定之資料列型別使用列舉型別。Each row in the control has a designated row type using the enumeration. 下表列出不同的資料列型別。The following table lists the different row types. |資料列型別Row type|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataRow`|中的資料列控制項。A data row in the control.| |`EmptyDataRow`|中的空白資料列控制項。The empty row in the control. 顯示空白資料列時控制項沒有顯示任何記錄和範本沒有`null`。The empty row is displayed when the control has no records to display and the template is not `null`.| |`Footer`|頁尾資料列中的控制項。The footer row in the control.| |`Header`|中的標頭資料列控制項。The header row in the control.| |`Pager`|中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。A pager row in the control.| |`Separator`|中的資料列分隔符號控制項。A separator row in the control.| 若要判斷資料列型別物件，請使用屬性。To determine the row type of a object, use the property. A物件都有與其相關聯的狀態。A object also has a state associated with it. 狀態可以是下表中的值的位元組合。The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table. |狀態值State value|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`Alternate`|物件是在替代資料列控制項。The object is an alternate row in the control.| |`Edit`|物件是處於編輯模式。The object is in edit mode.| |`Normal`|物件為其標準 （預設值） 的狀態。The object is in its normal (default) state.| |`Selected`|選取物件。The object is selected.| 若要決定狀態物件，請使用屬性。To determine the state of a object, use the property. 控制項儲存它的資料列中的所有集合。The control stores all of its data rows in the collection. 若要判斷索引物件存放至集合，使用屬性。To determine the index of a object in the collection, use the property. 您可以存取繫結至基礎資料物件的屬性物件使用屬性。You can access the properties of the underlying data object that is bound to the object by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 屬性時，可使用只在下列期間之後事件控制項。The property is available only during and after the event of a control. 若要判斷基礎資料來源中的資料物件的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the data object in the underlying data source, use the property. 您可以存取每一個儲存格物件使用屬性。You can access the individual cells of the object by using the property. 如果資料格包含其他控制項，您可以使用從儲存格擷取控制項儲存格的集合。If a cell contains other controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the collection of the cell. 您也可以使用方法來尋找控制項，如果控制項的儲存格的指定。You can also use the method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an specified. 若要擷取的欄位值欄位資料行或自動產生的欄位資料行，使用資料格的屬性。To retrieve a field value from a field column or an automatically generated field column, use the property of the cell. 若要擷取的欄位值從其他位置的欄位值繫結至控制項的欄位資料行類型，先擷取控制項從適當的資料格，然後存取控制項的適當的屬性。To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 您可使用資料繫結運算式中直接沒有繫結至控制項的屬性的值的欄位資料行。It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a field column without binding the value to a property of a control. 在此情況下，將欄位值會自動放入控制項。In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a control. 若要擷取的欄位值，您必須先擷取控制項從適當的資料格，然後使用其屬性。To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then use its property. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件擷取的資料格中的欄位值控制，然後在頁面上顯示的值。The following example demonstrates how to use a object to retrieve a field value from a cell in the control and then display the value on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRow/CS/gridviewrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRow/VB/gridviewrowvb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用物件，以擷取控制項中宣告欄位資料行中的編輯項目範本。The following example demonstrates how to use a object to retrieve a control declared in a field column's edit item template. 文字方塊的值再傳遞給更新資料來源中的控制項。The value of the text box is then passed to a control for updating in the data source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowFindControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowFindControl/CS/gridviewrowfindcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowFindControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowFindControl/VB/gridviewrowfindcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體物件。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of a object. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`dataItemIndex` 參數的值。The value of the `dataItemIndex` parameter.| ||`rowIndex` 參數的值。The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| ||`rowState` 參數的值。The value of the `rowState` parameter.| ||`rowType` 參數的值。The value of the `rowType` parameter.|

span.span: An that represents the underlying data object to which the object is bound.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取基礎資料的目標物件的屬性物件繫結。Use the property to access the properties of the underlying data object to which the object is bound. 期間和之後，才可以使用屬性事件控制項。The property is only available during and after the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料列。This property applies only to data rows. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以擷取欄位值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve a field value. 值，然後用來預先選取的項目控制項顯示資料列處於編輯模式時。The value is then used to pre-select an item in a control displayed when a row is in edit mode. span.span: Gets the state of the object.
A bitwise combination of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷狀態的物件。Use the property to determine the state of the object. 狀態可以是下表中的值的位元組合：The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table: |狀態值Status value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|物件是在替代資料列控制項。The object is an alternate row in the control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|物件是處於編輯模式。The object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|物件為其標準 （預設值） 的狀態。The object is in its normal (default) state.| |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|選取物件。The object is selected.| 這個屬性通常用於執行作業之前判斷資料列的狀態。This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷資料列是否處於編輯模式，或已選取。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a row is in edit mode or is selected. 如果使用者選取不同的資料列時控制項處於編輯模式，控制項結束編輯模式。If the user selects a different row while the control is in edit mode, the control exits edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowState/CS/gridviewrowrowstatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowState/VB/gridviewrowrowstatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件的資料列型別。

span.span: Gets the row type of the object.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷類型的資料列，物件表示。Use the property to determine the type of row that the object represents. 下表列出使用不同的資料列型別值列舉型別。The following table lists the different row type values using the enumeration. |資料列型別Row type|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||中的資料列控制項。A data row in the control.| ||頁尾資料列中的控制項。The footer row in the control.| ||中的標頭資料列控制項。The header row in the control.| ||中的空白資料列控制項。The empty row in the control. 顯示空白資料列時控制項沒有任何要顯示的記錄。The empty row is displayed when control does not have any records to display.| ||中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。A pager row in the control.| ||中的資料列分隔符號控制項。A separator row in the control.| 這個屬性通常用於執行作業之前判斷資料列的型別。This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來決定所建立的資料列是否為頁尾資料列。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a row being created is a footer row. 如果資料列頁尾資料列，資料行的加總的值會更新至頁尾資料列。If the row is a footer row, the value for the sum of the column is updated into the footer row. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowRowType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowType/CS/gridviewrowrowtypecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowRowType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowType/VB/gridviewrowrowtypevb.aspx#1)]
